sentences.en: Many companies even maintain their own credit departments that investigate the creditworthiness of each prospective customer.
sentences.cn: 很多公司甚至设置了自己的赊销信用管理部门调查潜在客户的资信.

sentences.en: These positions now endanger the creditworthiness of the European banking system.
sentences.cn: 这些状况现在威胁到欧洲银行体系的信用.

sentences.en: They now take extra steps to verify the creditworthiness of customers.
sentences.cn: 他们现在又采取额外措施来核实客户的信用度。

words.tran_cn: 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂
